A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I really liked this movie. It didn't stick to the original storyline of Jedi master and Apprentice. I like that because it sets the stage for Rey to be a unique Jedi who struggles finding out how to use the force. Which will make her successes more satisfying. I also thought the evolution of Kylo as a psychopath was excellent. I even liked the detour of the movie that many criticize. I think the only valid criticism of the movie was pacing & overabundance of jokes. Overall\, it's a great addition to the Star Wars family.
